titles.title: Recognizing the importance of chemistry to our everyday lives and supporting the goals and ideals of National Chemistry Week.
Recognizing the importance of chemistry to our everyday lives and supporting the goals and ideals of National Chemistry Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Mr. Gingrey moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 395.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Chemistry Week, as founded by the American Chemical Society (the week of October 19 in 2003).
